Mugging after the grind

By Sam Matthews | Published 2012-07-26 02:56:25 -0700

The guys from the State Cartographer’s Office did some good work yesterday. Fantastic presentations and tutorials on postGIS and server-side data management. Despite the fact that we meet after work, numbers were impressive last night! Here’s some photos of the crew in action.
